org.apache.spark.examples.streaming

Class KinesisWordCountProducerASL

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.examples.streaming.KinesisWordCountProducerASL

  • public class KinesisWordCountProducerASL
extends Object
    Usage: KinesisWordCountProducerASL is the name of the Kinesis stream (ie. mySparkStream) is the endpoint of the Kinesis service (ie. https://kinesis.us-east-1.amazonaws.com) is the rate of records per second to put onto the stream is the rate of records per second to put onto the stream

    Example: $ export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID= $ export AWS_SECRET_KEY= $ $SPARK_HOME/bin/run-example \ org.apache.spark.examples.streaming.KinesisWordCountProducerASL mySparkStream \ https://kinesis.us-east-1.amazonaws.com 10 5
